bio: Author. Radio host. AWJ Chicago president. The Op-Ed Project mentor-editor.sr. facilitator. Adventuress. Grade-A sass-mouth but stickler for manners. WGN Radio host Tribune Company GM/Publisher, RedEye/Metromix University of Chicago's Graham School adjunct faculty Tribune Company SEO/social media mgr., 'So Social' columnist, #30SecSocial co-host Chicago Tribune digital news editor, books So New Media author
